H0.text: what does jamaican people speak. Patois

H1.text: what does jamaican people speak. Creole

H2.text: what does jamaican people speak. Caribbean English

H3.text: what does jamaican people speak. Jamaican English

A4.text: Jamaican Patois is spoken by most Jamaicans as a native language.

A5.text: Jamaican Patois is also called Jamaican Creole by linguists.

A6.text: Standard English is the language of education, high culture, government, the media and official/formal communications.

A7.text: Jamaican Patois has begun to be used on the radio as well as the news.
